member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.Name
member.summary: The machine readable name of the mod (no special characters or spaces)

remarks.para: This is used in logs that relate to this mod. So this should always be Alphanumerical, without exception

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.Version
member.value: This should always be Semantic Versioning

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.GUIName
member.summary: Name used on GUI's, like ModSettings

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.MelonLoaderVersion
member.summary: The minimum Melon Loader version that your mod requires

remarks.para: This should only be increased if you actually require a newer version of MelonLoader. NEVER change it before an update has been properly tested
If a user has a version less than this, MelonLoader will not load this mod

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.PreviousAuthors
member.summary: Who used to handle the mod

remarks.para: When implemented, this will show the previous authors of this mod
This must be a link to a file, not a site

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.Copyright
member.remarks: When updating the year, use the StartYear-CurrentYear format eg(Copyright Â© 2020-2024)

member.name: F:StalkerAidsAndSupplements.BuildInfo.Priority
member.summary: Priority of your mod. Most of the time you should not need to change this
